.. index:: IndexedExponents

.. _l496e64657865644578706f6e656e7473:

IndexedExponents Varset
=======================

:viewcode:`multpoly.spad line 858 <multpoly.spad#L858>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <multpoly.spad#L858>`

* Varset: \ :ref:`OrderedSet <l4f726465726564536574>`\ 


IndexedExponents of an ordered set of variables gives a representation for the degree of polynomials in commuting variables. It gives an ordered pairing of non negative integer exponents with variables


.. _l496e64657865644578706f6e656e7473-30:

\ :ref:`0 <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964-30>`\ \: % 
  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\
